music21.alpha.trecento.capuaProbabilities¶

Module to determine how often we would expect to have Francesco’s cadences happen by chance

Functions¶

music21.alpha.trecento.capuaProbabilities.countCadencePercentages()¶
music21.alpha.trecento.capuaProbabilities.getLandiniRandomStart(i)¶

according to distribution of starting tenor notes of Landini cadences
